name: Ascension (fraxle)
description:
Use the power of a Demon overlord to ascend to godhood!

But don't let him die, otherwise the ritual will not be complete. 

Manage your resources

Keep  the demon weak enough to drain him of his power, but make sure his imps aren't able to finish him off before you reach ascension.

Controls

Left click to shoot a bolt of lightning at your foe when your cursor is white

Install Instructions

Extract the zip file and run the executable
